PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 - 外国语 -... ... deerskin 鹿皮 deerstalker 猎鹿人 deerstalking 猎鹿.
猎鹿帽（deerstalker），是一种前后有帽舌，并带有护耳的帽子。传统的猎鹿帽一般以英国花呢制成。

list.abs: deerstalker 猎鹿人deerstalking 猎鹿deerweed 菽豆科植物

entry.def: A deerstalker is an old-fashioned hat with parts at the sides which can be folded down to cover the ears. Deerstalkers are usually worn by men.

means.word_mean: 1. a tight-fitting hat with visors front and back; formerly worn by hunters

auth_sentence.content: Elementary, dear investor Ian Burke has got his deerstalker on.
auth_sentence.res_content: Elementary, dear investor Ian Burke has got his deerstalker on.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Elementary, dear investor Ian Burke has got his deerstalker on.

auth_sentence.content: He's since become a deerstalker of the Paris netherworld, and he looks it with his stringy graying hair and Buffalo Bill beard.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He's since become a deerstalker of the Paris netherworld, and he looks it with his stringy graying hair and Buffalo Bill beard.

auth_sentence.content: The deerstalker and Meerschaum pipe have served generations of thesps, from Basil Rathbone to Jeremy Brett.
